parameters.name: ParameterGroupDesc
parameters.description: The description of the parameter template in the destination region.

parameters.name: ParameterGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the parameter template. You can call the DescribeParameterGroups operation to query the parameter template ID.

parameters.name: ParameterGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the parameter template in the destination region.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the source region to which the parameter template belongs. You can call the DescribeRegions operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group. You can leave this parameter empty.

parameters.name: TargetRegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the destination region. You can call the DescribeRegions operation to query the most recent region list.
